definition: a hazy or indistinct representation, to become vague or indistinct
details:
noun
- a hazy or indistinct representation
= example: a hazy or indistinct representation
= synonyms: fuzz
verb
- to become vague or indistinct
= example: to become vague or indistinct
= synonyms: dim
- to make dim or indistinct
= example: to make dim or indistinct
= synonyms: blear
- to make unclear, indistinct, or blurred
= example: to make unclear, indistinct, or blurred
= synonyms: obscure
- make a smudge on
= example: make a smudge on
= synonyms: smear
- to become glassy
= example: to become glassy
= synonyms: glaze over, film over
- to make less distinct or clear
= example: to make less distinct or clear
